thread.title: Keep KELOLAND Warm To Hold First Giveaway
thread.title_full: Keep KELOLAND Warm To Hold First Giveaway

title: Keep KELOLAND Warm To Hold First Giveaway
text:
Keep KELOLAND Warm To Hold First Giveaway October 15, 2015, 7:59 AM SIOUX FALLS, SD - 
The weather might have been pleasant in recent days, but we know that temperatures are soon to fall in KELOLAND. Thursday marks the year’s first giveaway for Keep KELOLAND Warm. 
The giveaway happens Thursday at the downtown Sioux Falls library between 4:00 and 6:00 p.m. 
Anyone who can’t afford a coat, or any other winter clothing, is invited. Keep KELOLAND Warm is a joint operation with Lewis Drug stores, and donations have been pouring in. At the Lewis Drug on 41st Street and Minnesota Avenue, generous people have already donated 12 bags’ worth of coats, scarves and hats. 
All Sioux Falls Lewis Drug locations are accepting donations for the campaign. © 2015 KELOLAND TV. All Rights Reserved.
